LanguageData.ARA_CorpseConverter.InsufficientFuel: Unable to convert corpse due to insufficient biomass
LanguageData.ARA_CorpseConverter.InsufficientFuelForM: Unable to mark for demolition due to lack of biomass
LanguageData.ARA_CorpseConverter.StockpileCreated: A corpse storage zone has been created ({0} square)
LanguageData.ARA_CorpseConverter.AutoMarkEnabled: Automatic demolition marking is now enabled
LanguageData.ARA_CorpseConverter.AutoMarkDisabled: Automatic demolition marking has been disabled
LanguageData.ARA_CorpseConverter.CreateStockpileDesc: Creates a corpse storage zone within range of the converter, allowing for intensive conversion of corpses
LanguageData.ARA_CorpseConverter.ToggleAutoMarkDesc: Enable or disable the automatic demolition marking function. When enabled, the device will periodically mark target buildings within range for demolition.
